directions: Combine stewed tomatoes, water, brown rice, orange bell pepper, onion, oil, ancho chile powder, and vegetable bouillon in a saucepan over low heat. Cover and stir occasionally. Simmer until rice is cooked and liquid is mostly absorbed, about 45 minutes.
ingredients: ½ large orange bell pepper, diced
1 cube vegetable bouillon (such as The Organic Gourmet™)
title: Vegetarian Spanish Rice
